results.title: [Control of hyperinsulinemia in essential hypertension using the angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitor, lisinopril].

results.title: [Efficacy of combined antihypertensive treatment with amlodipine and lisinopril in metabolic syndrome].
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@ monotherapy improved @CHEMICAL_Carbohydrates @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002241 @@@carbohydrate@@@ metabolism as shown by reduction of postprandial @DISEASE_Hyperglycemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006943 @@@hyperglycemia@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hyperinsulinism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006946 @@@hyperinsulinemia@@@ in @DISEASE_Metabolic_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D024821 @@@MS@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.
